name: The Elven Resistance
description:
This game is my submission for the 1-Button Jam 2022.

You are the last hope for your people, the Elves, and you must fend off hundreds of attackers to prevent the decimation of your race.

As a great mage that you are, you are able to summon weapons and rain chaos on the heads of your enemies, but you have to grow stronger and stronger if you want to prevail.

Every kill counts: your people believes in you!

Credits
Sprites are from OpenGameArt > http://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles
Sound effects generated with jsfxr > https://sfxr.me/
BGM is from OpenGameArt CC0 > https://opengameart.org/content/boss-battle-1-8-bit-re-upload
Anything else is made by me
